message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for the offer, but $11,000 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $12,500?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,200?
